title: "Caja Robotics announces $12 million Series B funding"
excerpt: "Caja Robotics is a goods-to-person robotics system for unit picking that significantly increases order fulfillment productivity and warehouse storage capacity. The system employs two types of robots that collaborate with each other to share tasks and can adapt to any existing warehouse infrastructure."
